column4: hey all, how can I set my linksys router to forward everything up to the network its in(dhcp requests, logon info for domain, etc.)? I have 2 that do this quite well, but my third is a different model and tries to be a dhcp server. If i disable the dhcp server, then no one gets an ip, so i am trying to tell it to forward up to the network its in and be transparents to the packets from...
...wireless clients to server, any ideas of what generally needs set?
i don't think this is an ubuntu specific problem
but no one is in networking or linksys
